p: In this model the three doses of the extract (100, 200 and 400 mg/kg) showed significantly mice paw swelling inhibition (p < 0.05, p < 0.01, p < 0.001 respectively) starting from the 1 st day of observation and the effects progressed (p < 0.01 and p < 0.001) till the 7 th day. The effect shown by the extract was in dose dependent manner.
